name: Kibu and the Buzzsaw Invasion
description:
A frustrating game about a cute wolf that dies a lot.
Don't play if you don't want a challenge.

Introduction:

It seems the traps from the nearby ruins have escaped...

The bloodthirsty blades want nothing but death for the creatures of the woods, but the brave wolf Kibu has ventured forth to investigate the source of the trouble...

Unfortunately, he will die.
A lot.

But after countless painful deaths,
after being sent back to the beginning so many times,
perhaps he will silence the whirring saws once more...

Controls:

Arrow Keys / WASD - Move
Space / Up Arrow - Jump
R - Reset
Escape - Quit

Disclaimer:

Yes, this game is designed to be frustrating and difficult.
And yet, a perfect run only takes about 2 minutes to complete.
Good luck. You'll need it.

Credits:

BFXR - Sound effect generator (https://www.bfxr.net)

All art and code produced by Incredible Catfish

Created in Unity for a Unity game programming class in March/April 2020.

The assignment was to make a "2D platformer troll game" inspired by "I Wanna Be The Guy."
